page.title: 03CULLODEN ACADEMY
page.content: Culloden Academy is the only secondary for three miles.It was built in 1979 but the pupils did not come in till 1981.Before that,the children in the same area went to Millburn Academy by bus.Then Culloden Academy started in the old Inverness Royal Academy building while the new building was being completed.There will be 840 pupils from August 85'.Over 200 begin 1st year.The school is accommodated to hold 1000 pupils.There is a balance of male and female teachers.About 60% of pupils stay on after the minimum leaving age.Most teachers and parents raise money by running fetes or doing fun runs.
